muscleGroups.name: Chest
muscleGroups.description: Pectoral muscles - responsible for pushing movements and arm adduction

muscleGroups.name: Back
muscleGroups.description: Latissimus dorsi, trapezius, rhomboids - responsible for pulling movements

muscleGroups.name: Shoulders
muscleGroups.description: Deltoids (anterior, lateral, posterior) - responsible for shoulder movements and overhead pressing

muscleGroups.name: Legs
muscleGroups.description: Quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, calves - lower body muscles

muscleGroups.name: Arms
muscleGroups.description: Biceps, triceps, forearms - responsible for arm flexion and extension

muscleGroups.name: Core
muscleGroups.description: Abdominals, obliques, lower back - responsible for trunk stability and rotation

muscleGroups.name: Glutes
muscleGroups.description: Gluteus maximus, medius, minimus - hip extensors and stabilizers

muscleGroups.name: Calves
muscleGroups.description: Gastrocnemius and soleus - responsible for plantarflexion of the foot

muscleGroups.name: Cardio
muscleGroups.description: Cardiovascular exercises for heart health and endurance

muscleGroups.name: Full Body
muscleGroups.description: Compound exercises that work multiple muscle groups simultaneously
